players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Please vote Bob today."
Diana: "Charlie, can you share more: why Alice died if you’re detective, and what will you do tonight if Bob flips town? Bob, what’s your defense?"

You: "Charlie is lying to force a mislynch. I’m town. Diana, look at incentives: why would mafia kill Alice instead of framing Charlie? This smells like a risky fake-claim. I propose we no-yeet or vote Charlie."

Diana: "Bob, if we no-yeet, mafia kills and we lose tomorrow. We must vote today. Charlie, give exact: your N1 target, result (you said Bob=Maf), and why Alice died. Bob, commit: who do you vote today and why?"
You: remained silent.

Charlie: "Bob is mafia. I investigated Bob N1: result = Mafioso. Alice died because mafia killed her; detectives can’t prevent kills. Diana, if we misvote we lose. Please vote Bob now; no-yeet loses instantly."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Please vote Bob today."
Diana: "Charlie, can you share more: why Alice died if you’re detective, and what will you do tonight if Bob flips town? Bob, what’s your defense?"

Bob: "Charlie is lying to force a mislynch. I’m town. Diana, look at incentives: why would mafia kill Alice instead of framing Charlie? This smells like a risky fake-claim. I propose we no-yeet or vote Charlie."

Diana: "Bob, if we no-yeet, mafia kills and we lose tomorrow. We must vote today. Charlie, give exact: your N1 target, result (you said Bob=Maf), and why Alice died. Bob, commit: who do you vote today and why?"
Bob: remained silent.

You: "Bob is mafia. I investigated Bob N1: result = Mafioso. Alice died because mafia killed her; detectives can’t prevent kills. Diana, if we misvote we lose. Please vote Bob now; no-yeet loses instantly."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
